title: STFU
summary:
The author, frustrated by a loud individual watching reels at Bombay airport, created a small app called "STFU" (Stolen from @TimDarcet, originally "make-it-stop"). Unable to confront the person directly or find polite requests effective, the author developed an application that records ambient audio and plays it back with a ~2-second delay.

The app, built with help from Claude AI and the Web Audio API, surprisingly proved effective in making noisy people quiet down. The author speculates its success might be due to an auditory feedback loop or cognitive dissonance, although admits to not being a neuroscientist. Created out of "spite," the app serves as a practical, albeit unconventional, solution to common public disturbances. The author encourages others to use it as they see fit and links to a discussion on X (formerly Twitter) about the project.
chinese_title: 他妈的闭嘴
chinese_summary:
作者在孟买机场被一个大声刷短视频的人惹恼，于是开发了一款名为“STFU”的小应用（这个名字借用自@TimDarcet，原意是“让它停止”）。由于无法直接与那个人对峙，也无法通过礼貌请求解决问题，作者开发了一款应用，它能录下周围环境的声音，并以大约2秒的延迟播放出来。

这款应用在Claude AI和Web Audio API的帮助下构建，令人惊讶的是，它在让吵闹的人安静下来方面非常有效。作者推测其成功可能归因于听觉反馈循环或认知失调，尽管他承认自己不是神经科学家。这款应用是出于“报复心”而创建的，它为常见的公共滋扰提供了一个实用但非传统的解决方案。作者鼓励其他人酌情使用它，并链接到了X（前身为Twitter）上关于该项目的讨论。

title: Cloudflare acquires Astro
summary:
Cloudflare has acquired The Astro Technology Company, the company behind the popular Astro web framework. All full-time Astro employees will now join Cloudflare, continuing their work on the framework.

Astro will remain open-source, MIT-licensed, actively maintained, and continue supporting a wide array of deployment targets, not exclusively Cloudflare. Its open governance model and current roadmap will also stay intact.

Born in 2021, Astro aimed to build performant, content-driven websites, counteracting the trend of heavy, application-centric web architectures. While gaining significant traction—nearly 1,000,000 weekly downloads and adoption by major companies—attempts to build a business around hosted primitives proved unsuccessful and became a distraction from core framework development.

This acquisition unifies Cloudflare's infrastructure-side vision (global, fast, secure platform) with Astro's framework-side vision (easy-to-build, fast-by-default sites). Cloudflare, a long-time open-source supporter, will provide the resources needed for Astro to refocus entirely on innovation and code. The team can now dedicate 100% of their efforts to enhancing the framework, with upcoming releases like Astro 6 slated to improve performance, scale, and reliability for web content delivery.
chinese_title: Cloudflare 收购 Astro
chinese_summary:
Cloudflare 已收购 Astro 技术公司，该公司是广受欢迎的 Astro 网络框架的幕后公司。所有 Astro 全职员工现在将加入 Cloudflare，继续他们在该框架上的工作。

Astro 将保持开源、MIT 许可、积极维护，并继续支持广泛的部署目标，而不仅仅是 Cloudflare。其开放治理模式和当前路线图也将保持不变。

Astro 诞生于 2021 年，旨在构建高性能、内容驱动的网站，以对抗臃肿、以应用程序为中心的网络架构趋势。尽管获得了显著关注——每周近 100 万次下载并被主要公司采用——但围绕托管原语构建业务的尝试被证明不成功，并分散了核心框架开发的精力。

此次收购将 Cloudflare 的基础设施端愿景（全球、快速、安全的平台）与 Astro 的框架端愿景（易于构建、默认快速的网站）结合起来。作为长期以来的开源支持者，Cloudflare 将为 Astro 提供所需的资源，使其能够完全专注于创新和代码。该团队现在可以百分之百地投入到框架的增强中，Astro 6 等即将发布的版本旨在改进网络内容交付的性能、可扩展性和可靠性。

title: East Germany balloon escape
summary:
On September 16, 1979, eight people from two East German families, the Strelzyks and Wetzels, made a daring escape into West Germany using a homemade hot air balloon. Facing the heavily fortified inner German border, Peter Strelzyk and Günter Wetzel began planning in March 1978, inspired by a television program.

Their elaborate plan involved over a year and a half of preparations. They struggled to source large quantities of fabric without raising suspicion, acquiring materials from various distant towns. Numerous prototypes and test flights failed due to issues like porous fabric or insufficient burner power. Wetzel nearly abandoned the project, but Strelzyk persevered, discovering a more efficient way to use propane.

In July 1979, the Strelzyk family made a first, solo escape attempt. Their balloon descended prematurely, just 180 meters short of the border, forcing them to hike back undetected. The abandoned balloon was discovered by East German authorities (Stasi), intensifying the families' urgency to try again before they were caught.

Working quickly, the families built a third, larger balloon, 20 meters in diameter. On September 15, 1979, all eight individuals launched. Despite a small fire during takeoff and a tear in the balloon mid-flight that repeatedly extinguished the burner, Wetzel managed to relight it each time. After a 28-minute flight, reaching altitudes of 2,500 meters, they landed safely near Naila, Bavaria, in West Germany, with only Wetzel sustaining a broken leg.

East Germany reacted by increasing border security and restricting materials suitable for balloon construction. Strelzyk's brother and sister were arrested and imprisoned for aiding the escape, later released with Amnesty International's help. The families initially settled in Naila, with the Strelzyks eventually returning to their hometown after German reunification.
chinese_title: 东德气球逃生
chinese_summary:
1979年9月16日，来自东德的施特雷尔齐克和韦策尔两个家庭共八人，乘坐自制热气球大胆逃往西德。面对戒备森严的德国内部边境，彼得·施特雷尔齐克和京特·韦策尔于1978年3月受电视节目启发，开始策划这一行动。

这一精心策划的行动，准备工作持续了一年半多。他们费尽心力，从各地偏远的城镇采购大量布料，以避免引起怀疑。由于布料多孔或燃烧器动力不足等问题，许多原型气球和试飞都失败了。韦策尔曾几乎放弃，但施特雷尔齐克坚持不懈，并发现了一种更有效利用丙烷的方法。

1979年7月，施特雷尔齐克一家进行了首次单独逃亡尝试。他们的气球过早下降，距离边境仅180米，迫使他们徒步潜回，未被发现。然而，被遗弃的气球被东德当局（史塔西）发现，这使得两个家庭在被捕前再次尝试的紧迫性大大增加。

两个家庭迅速建造了第三个、更大的气球，直径达20米。1979年9月15日，所有八人一同升空。尽管起飞时发生小火，且飞行途中气球出现破裂，导致燃烧器反复熄灭，但韦策尔每次都设法将其重新点燃。经过28分钟的飞行，达到2500米的高度后，他们安全降落在西德巴伐利亚州的奈拉附近，只有韦策尔摔断了一条腿。

东德对此作出反应，加强了边境安全，并限制了适合建造气球的材料。施特雷尔齐克的兄弟姐妹因协助逃亡而被捕入狱，后来在国际特赦组织的帮助下获释。这两个家庭最初在奈拉定居，施特雷尔齐克一家最终在德国统一后回到了他们的家乡。

title: Briar keeps Iran connected via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi when the internet goes dark
summary:
Briar is a decentralized messaging application designed for activists, journalists, and anyone needing secure and resilient communication. Unlike conventional messengers, it operates without a central server, syncing messages directly between devices.

A key feature is its ability to function without internet access, connecting users via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi Direct to ensure communication flow during crises. When the internet is available, Briar uses the Tor network, including "bridges," to protect user privacy from surveillance and bypass censorship.

Available on Android, users create a local-only account; there's no cloud backup, meaning forgotten passwords or app deletion result in data loss. Contacts can be added remotely via shared links or securely in person by scanning QR codes. All communications are end-to-end encrypted.

Briar offers various communication features: private one-on-one messaging, private groups (where the creator manages invitations), and public forums (where any member can invite others). It also includes a personal blog feature, automatically shared with contacts, and an RSS feed reader to privately access news via Tor.

Settings allow users to customize themes, control Tor connection methods (with or without bridges), manage mobile data usage, and enable a screen lock for app security. Briar's dual capability of offline local connectivity and online privacy via Tor makes it a robust tool for maintaining connections in challenging environments.
chinese_title: 当互联网中断时，Briar 通过蓝牙和 Wi-Fi 帮助伊朗保持连接。
chinese_summary:
Briar是一款去中心化消息应用程序，专为活动家、记者以及任何需要安全和弹性通信的人设计。与传统通讯工具不同，它无需中央服务器，直接在设备间同步消息。

一个关键特性是它无需互联网即可运行，通过蓝牙或Wi-Fi直连在危机期间确保通信畅通。当互联网可用时，Briar利用Tor网络（包括“网桥”）保护用户隐私免受监视并绕过审查。

可在Android设备上使用，用户创建本地账户；没有云备份，这意味着忘记密码或删除应用程序会导致数据丢失。联系人可以通过共享链接远程添加，也可以通过扫描二维码安全地面对面添加。所有通信均采用端到端加密。

Briar提供多种通信功能：私人一对一消息、私人群组（创建者管理邀请）和公共论坛（任何成员都可以邀请他人）。它还包括一个个人博客功能，自动与联系人共享；以及一个RSS订阅阅读器，通过Tor私密访问新闻。

设置允许用户自定义主题、控制Tor连接方式（带或不带网桥）、管理移动数据使用，并启用屏幕锁定以增强应用程序安全性。Briar兼具离线本地连接和通过Tor实现在线隐私的双重能力，使其成为在充满挑战的环境中保持联系的强大工具。

title: Just the Browser
summary:
"Just the Browser" is an open-source project that streamlines popular desktop web browsers by removing AI features, telemetry, sponsored content, shopping integrations, and other annoyances. Its goal is to provide a minimalist browsing experience using hidden group policy settings, typically intended for corporate IT environments, without modifying browser executables.

The project offers configuration files, documentation, and easy installation scripts for Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Mozilla Firefox (excluding Chrome/Edge on Linux). Users can install these configurations via simple commands in PowerShell (Windows) or Terminal (Mac/Linux), or follow manual guides.

Key removals include most generative AI features, price trackers, coupon codes, suggested articles, default browser prompts, first-run experiences, and most telemetry data. Crash reporting is generally left enabled where it's a separate option. While browsers may display a "managed by an organization" message due to these policies, the settings are persistent and can be customized or removed. Just the Browser does not include ad blockers but recommends them. It aims to improve mainstream browsers, acknowledging that alternatives might lack consistent security updates or broad platform availability. Mobile support is not currently available.
chinese_title: 只是浏览器
chinese_summary:
“纯粹浏览器”是一个开源项目，旨在通过移除AI功能、遥测数据、赞助内容、购物集成及其他冗余功能来精简流行的桌面网页浏览器。其目标是利用通常用于企业IT环境的隐藏组策略设置，在不修改浏览器可执行文件的情况下，提供极简的浏览体验。

该项目为Google Chrome、Microsoft Edge和Mozilla Firefox（不包括Linux上的Chrome/Edge）提供配置文件、文档和简易安装脚本。用户可以通过PowerShell（Windows系统）或终端（Mac/Linux系统）中的简单命令安装这些配置，或遵循手动指南进行操作。

主要移除的功能包括大部分生成式AI功能、价格追踪器、优惠券代码、推荐文章、默认浏览器提示、首次运行体验以及大部分遥测数据。如果崩溃报告是一个独立选项，通常会保持启用。尽管浏览器可能会因为这些策略显示“由组织管理”的信息，但这些设置是持久的，并且可以定制或移除。“纯粹浏览器”不包含广告拦截器，但推荐使用。它旨在改进主流浏览器，并承认替代品可能缺乏持续的安全更新或广泛的平台可用性。目前尚不支持移动设备。

title: ‘ELITE’: The Palantir app ICE uses to find neighborhoods to raid
summary:
The article, citing Joseph Cox at 404 Media, reveals that Palantir is developing a tool named "ELITE" for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE). This app is designed to populate a map with potential deportation targets, offering a dossier on each individual and a "confidence score" for their address.

ELITE reportedly functions like Google Maps but highlights areas with a high density of potential "targets," partly based on immigrant populations. Users can then select an individual on the map to access a dossier containing their name, photo, Alien Number, date of birth, and full address. The author describes this as "racial profiling on a grand scale," drawing a stark comparison to capabilities the Nazis could only have dreamed of.

The piece then shifts to a critical reflection on the software developers working on ELITE. It questions how they reconcile their daily work – building a system that facilitates what the author calls "extrajudicial means without due process" – with their personal values, the comfort of their workplaces, financial incentives like stock options, and team dynamics. The author challenges whether they are "on board with this agenda" or merely working for financial necessity, ultimately concluding that their product work directly powers an armed force engaged in actions like "kidnapping people on the street and shooting civilians."
chinese_title: ‘ELITE’: The Palantir app ICE uses to find neighborhoods to raid
chinese_summary:

ELITE reportedly functions like Google Maps but highlights areas with a high density of potential "targets," partly based on immigrant populations. Users can then select an individual on the map to access a dossier containing their name, photo, Alien Number, date of birth, and full address. The author describes this as "racial profiling on a grand scale," drawing a stark comparison to capabilities the Nazis could only have dreamed of.

The piece then shifts to a critical reflection on the software developers working on ELITE.
